item.title: I need help!
item.dc:creator: @The_Almost The Almost
item.description:
@The_Almost wrote:

ok guys im using a tut to add barrows and it says search for this

public boolean process()

and then it says

in it add this

writePlayers();

where do i put wrteplayers(); in public boolean process()

and when i search for public boolean process() this is some of the code that is under it!

public boolean process() { // is being called regularily every 500ms if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 6583 == true){//coded by The Almost npcId = 2626; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 6583 == false){ isNpc = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (actionAmount < 0) { actionAmount = 0; } if (actionTimer > 0) { actionTimer -= 1; } if (actionAmount > 25) { sendMessage("Kicked for acting too fast!"); misc.println("Client acts too fast - disconnecting it"); disconnected = true; } if (theifTimer > 0) { theifTimer -= 1; } if (AgilityTimer > 0) { AgilityTimer -= 1; } if (WCTimer > 0) { WCTimer -= 1; }
can anyone help me?
